document_data.name: Quelindritar
document_data.mainbody: '''Quelindritar''', also known as '''Wardancer''',<ref group="note" name="NN">Though referred to as a male in The Rite, Wardancer is listed as a female in the roll call and in The Ruin. The latter sources are considered to take precedence. was a [[bronze dragon]] who had lived in the [[Moonsea]] her entire life, and one of [[Karasendrieth]]'s rogues.
document_data.History:
On [[Kythorn 6]] of {{yearlink|1373}}, she was one of the proponents of the theory that it was the [[Zhentarim]] in [[Thentia]] that summoned the [[chasme]] that slew [[Sinylla Zoranyian]] while disrupting the efforts of the mages of Thentia to decrypt [[Sammaster]]'s notes, and she suggested acting immediately, irrespective of any confirmation. She eventually relented at the request of Sinylla's kin.{{cite book/The Rite}}

During the final battle against [[Sammaster]] on [[Nightal 7]] of that same year, Quelindritar was one the Talons that were sent to attack Sammaster's citadel. She was one of the few Talons who survived the battle.
